Attacks.Name: Bite
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Ekans gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Poison Sting
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Intimidate
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 must reroll one success in their attack rolls when targeting Ekans.

Superpowers.Name: Slither Away
Superpowers.Effect: Ekans may advance S. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Wrap
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Venomous Wrath
Superpowers.Effect: Ekans may reroll up to two dice in its attack rolls when using poison-type attacks.
